episode.title: Prison Oreos
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics include Daring Fireball's 15th anniversary, fruit fly infestations, clicky keyboards, sandwich cookies, the birth of Markdown, iOS 11's new "cop mode", favicons in Safari, Apple's Project Titan, last week's total solar eclipse, and Jerry Lewis.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics include Daring Fireball's 15th anniversary, fruit fly infestations, clicky keyboards, sandwich cookies, the birth of Markdown, iOS 11's new "cop mode", favicons in Safari, Apple's Project Titan, last week's total solar eclipse, and Jerry Lewis.

Sponsored by:

  • Casper: The Casper mattress was designed by a team of 20 engineers, and perfected by a community of nearly half a million sleepers. Use code thetalkshow for $50 toward your mattress.
  • AfterShokz: Headphones powered by bone-conduction technology.
  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code gruber for 10% off your first order.
  • Fracture: Your photos printed directly on glass.
